triples.name: Large language model
triples.relevance: Foundation technology for the communicative agents that the paper builds upon.

triples.name: Multi-agent system
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a novel framework for enabling scalable autonomous cooperation among multiple communicative agents.

triples.name: Chatbot
triples.relevance: The paper builds on advances in chat-based language models and conversational agents.

triples.name: Prompt engineering
triples.relevance: Inception prompting is a technique used to guide the chat agents toward task completion.

triples.name: Agent-based model
triples.relevance: The paper proposes role-playing as a framework for agent-based simulation of multi-agent cooperation.
